html:
For = For [say they] mimicking the prophet as though he were teaching little children in a school.

must be: or, [hath been]. The verse then reads: "For it is zav lazav
kav lakav, kav lakav
ze"er sham, ze"er sham . "The Figures of speech: Epizeuxis and Paronomasia (App-6), for emphasis. It may be Englished by: " Law upon law, Saw upon saw".
